name: InfiniGOLF (ArtOfProgramming)
description:
This is a game created for the LowRezJam 2021.

Controls:

Left mouse button + drag -> Decides direction + power the ball gets shot

Right mouse button -> cancel shot

C -> switch camera view

B -> Go back to main menu when in game

This game was developed by 

Programming: ArtOfProgramming

Art: ArtOfProgramming

Sound: Free sound effects from: mixkit.co
